name: Slip Slip Lite
summary:
This game is ridiculous.
This is a game only of running away.
This game will be over if you collide with enemy or missile.
But, the more it approaches the enemy, the more points are added.
Tilt your phone to control player.
Player slips easily. ( selectable )
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 开发者: Powerful Toast
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=jp.powerfultoast.android.slipsliplite
